quests.name: Survive the Cursed Labyrinth
quests.description: Enter the treacherous 'Cursed Labyrinth' and navigate its deadly traps, puzzles, and dark corridors. Survive the maze, fend off 'Cursed Minotaurs,' and find a way out.

quests.name: Solve the Riddle of the Labyrinth's Heart
quests.description: Discover the hidden heart of the labyrinth and 'Solve the Riddle of the Labyrinth's Heart.' Seek guidance from ancient spirits and outwit enigmatic puzzles to reach the labyrinth's core.

quests.name: The Minotaur's Curse
quests.description: Uncover the tragic history of the 'Cursed Minotaurs' and help break their curse. Explore hidden chambers, find 'Minotaur Artifacts,' and seek redemption for these tormented souls.

quests.name: Labyrinth of Illusions
quests.description: Confront the 'Puzzle Phantoms' who manipulate illusions within the labyrinth. Solve their intricate illusions and uncover the truth hidden behind their tricks.

quests.name: The Enigmatic Relic
quests.description: Hunt for the elusive 'Labyrinth Relic' said to grant incredible power. Outsmart guardian puzzles and overcome traps to retrieve this ancient treasure.
